11  package de.funfried.netbeans.plugins.external.formatter.eclipse;
12  
13  import java.util.SortedSet;
14  import java.util.prefs.Preferences;
15  
16  import javax.swing.SwingUtilities;
17  import javax.swing.text.BadLocationException;
18  import javax.swing.text.StyledDocument;
19  
20  import org.apache.commons.lang3.tuple.Pair;
21  import org.netbeans.editor.BaseDocument;
22  import org.openide.DialogDisplayer;
23  import org.openide.NotifyDescriptor;
24  import org.openide.awt.NotificationDisplayer;
25  import org.openide.awt.StatusDisplayer;
26  
27  import de.funfried.netbeans.plugins.external.formatter.AbstractFormatJob;
28  import de.funfried.netbeans.plugins.external.formatter.exceptions.CannotLoadConfigurationException;
29  import de.funfried.netbeans.plugins.external.formatter.exceptions.ConfigReadException;
30  import de.funfried.netbeans.plugins.external.formatter.exceptions.FormattingFailedException;
31  import de.funfried.netbeans.plugins.external.formatter.exceptions.ProfileNotFoundException;
32  import de.funfried.netbeans.plugins.external.formatter.ui.Icons;
33  import de.funfried.netbeans.plugins.external.formatter.ui.options.Settings;
34  
35  /**
36   * Abstract Eclipse formatter implementation of the {@link AbstractFormatJob} as a base
37   * class for any type of Eclipse Formatter.
38   *
39   * @author bahlef
40   */
41  public abstract class AbstractEclipseFormatJob extends AbstractFormatJob {
42  	/**
43  	 * Protected constructor to create a new instance of {@link AbstractEclipseFormatJob}.
44  	 *
45  	 * @param document        the {@link StyledDocument} which sould be formatted
46  	 * @param changedElements the ranges which should be formatted
47  	 */
48  	protected AbstractEclipseFormatJob(StyledDocument document, SortedSet<Pair<Integer, Integer>> changedElements) {
49  		super(document, changedElements);
50  	}
51  
52  	/**
53  	 * Returns the formatted content.
54  	 *
55  	 * @param pref             the {@link Preferences}
56  	 * @param formatterFile    the path to the formatter configuration file
57  	 * @param formatterProfile the name of the formatter configuration profile
58  	 * @param code             the current (unformatted) code
59  	 *
60  	 * @return the formatted content
61  	 *
62  	 * @throws ConfigReadException              if there is an issue parsing the formatter configuration
63  	 * @throws ProfileNotFoundException         if the given {@code profile} could not be found
64  	 * @throws CannotLoadConfigurationException if there is any issue accessing or reading the formatter configuration
65  	 * @throws FormattingFailedException        if the external formatter failed to format the given code
66  	 */
67  	protected abstract String getFormattedContent(Preferences pref, String formatterFile, String formatterProfile, String code)
68  			throws ConfigReadException, ProfileNotFoundException, CannotLoadConfigurationException, FormattingFailedException;
69  
70  	/**
71  	 * Returns the configured formatter configuration file.
72  	 *
73  	 * @param pref the {@link Preferences}
74  	 *
75  	 * @return the configured formatter configuration file
76  	 */
77  	protected abstract String getFormatterFile(Preferences pref);
78  
79  	/**
80  	 * Returns the configured formatter profile name.
81  	 *
82  	 * @param pref the {@link Preferences}
83  	 *
84  	 * @return the configured formatter profile name
85  	 */
86  	protected abstract String getFormatterProfile(Preferences pref);
87  
88  	/**
89  	 * Returns the configured line feed.
90  	 *
91  	 * @param pref the {@link Preferences}
92  	 *
93  	 * @return the configured line feed
94  	 */
95  	protected abstract String getLineFeed(Preferences pref);
96  
97  	/**
98  	 * Returns the content of the {@code document}.
99  	 *
100 	 * @param pref the {@link Preferences}
101 	 *
102 	 * @return The content of the {@code document}
103 	 */
104 	protected String getCode(Preferences pref) {
105 		String lineFeed = getLineFeed(pref);
106 
107 		//save with configured linefeed
108 		if (null != lineFeed) {
109 			document.putProperty(BaseDocument.READ_LINE_SEPARATOR_PROP, lineFeed);
110 			document.putProperty(BaseDocument.WRITE_LINE_SEPARATOR_PROP, lineFeed);
111 		}
112 
113 		return getCode();
114 	}
115 
116 	/**
117 	 * {@inheritDoc}
118 	 */
119 	@Override
120 	public final void format() throws BadLocationException {
121 		Preferences pref = Settings.getActivePreferences(document);
122 
123 		String formatterFile = getFormatterFile(pref);
124 		String formatterProfile = getFormatterProfile(pref);
125 
126 		String code = getCode(pref);
127 
128 		try {
129 			String formattedContent = getFormattedContent(pref, formatterFile, formatterProfile, code);
130 			if (setFormattedCode(code, formattedContent)) {
131 				String msg = getNotificationMessageForEclipseFormatterConfigurationFileType(formatterFile, formatterProfile);
132 
133 				SwingUtilities.invokeLater(() -> {
134 					if (pref.getBoolean(Settings.SHOW_NOTIFICATIONS, false)) {
135 						NotificationDisplayer.getDefault().notify("Format using Eclipse formatter", Icons.ICON_ECLIPSE, msg, null);
136 					}
137 
138 					StatusDisplayer.getDefault().setStatusText("Format using Eclipse formatter: " + msg);
139 				});
140 			}
141 		} catch (ProfileNotFoundException ex) {
142 			SwingUtilities.invokeLater(() -> {
143 				NotifyDescriptor notify = new NotifyDescriptor.Message(
144 						String.format("<html>Profile '%s' not found in <tt>%s</tt><br><br>Please configure a valid one in the project properties OR at Tools|Options|Editor|External Formatter!", formatterProfile,
145 								formatterFile),
146 						NotifyDescriptor.ERROR_MESSAGE);
147 				DialogDisplayer.getDefault().notify(notify);
148 
149 				StatusDisplayer.getDefault().setStatusText(String.format("Profile '%s' not found in %s", formatterProfile, formatterFile));
150 			});
151 
152 			throw ex;
153 		} catch (CannotLoadConfigurationException ex) {
154 			SwingUtilities.invokeLater(() -> {
155 				NotifyDescriptor notify = new NotifyDescriptor.Message(String.format("<html>Could not find configuration file %s.<br>Make sure the file exists and it can be read.", formatterFile),
156 						NotifyDescriptor.ERROR_MESSAGE);
157 				DialogDisplayer.getDefault().notify(notify);
158 
159 				StatusDisplayer.getDefault().setStatusText(String.format("Could not find configuration file %s. Make sure the file exists and it can be read.", formatterFile));
160 			});
161 
162 			throw ex;
163 		} catch (FormattingFailedException ex) {
164 			SwingUtilities.invokeLater(() -> {
165 				StatusDisplayer.getDefault().setStatusText("Failed to format using Eclipse formatter: " + ex.getMessage());
166 			});
167 
168 			throw ex;
169 		}
170 	}
171 
172 	/**
173 	 * Returns the message which should be shown in a notification after the formatting is done.
174 	 *
175 	 * @param formatterFile    the used formatter configuration file
176 	 * @param formatterProfile the used formatter profile
177 	 *
178 	 * @return the message which should be shown in a notification after the formatting is done
179 	 */
180 	protected abstract String getNotificationMessageForEclipseFormatterConfigurationFileType(String formatterFile, String formatterProfile);
181 }
